metadata.title: CVE-2024-50046 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:NFSv4: Prevent NULL-pointer dereference in nfs42_complete_copies()On the node of an NFS client, some files saved in the mountpoint of theNFS server were copied to another location of the same NFS server.Accidentally, the nfs42_complete_copies() got a NULL-pointer dereferencecrash with the following syslog:[232064.838881] NFSv4:
